Key Match Events: The Mavericks shot a blistering 18/38 from three-point range
The Lakers had a horrible finish to the second quarter after being up 50-44
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Steve Kerr was not mentioned, but the Lakers' strategy was discussed by LeBron James as the team being spread out and put in pick-and-rolls
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed disappointment in the Lakers' loss
The Lakers exit a two-game road trip to Texas without a win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Dallas desperately needed this win to push them back ahead of the Lakers in the Western Conference standings
The Mavericks were without Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving in the lineup
Others: The MavericksGameday will provide more coverage of the Dallas Mavericks throughout the 2024-25 Season
